hotels.name: Musha Cay
hotels.desc: Ultra-luxurious private island villa, exclusive retreat, billionaire getaway
hotels.longDesc: An ultra-exclusive private island villa in the Bahamas offering total privacy and unparalleled luxury for the world's most discerning travelers.

hotels.name: Baha Mar
hotels.desc: Luxury resort complex, beachfront, multiple restaurants and amenities
hotels.longDesc: A sprawling luxury resort destination in Nassau featuring pristine beaches, championship golf, world-class dining, and comprehensive family-friendly amenities.
hotels.address: 1 Baha Mar Blvd, Nassau, The Bahamas

hotels.name: The Cove, Atlantis
hotels.desc: Ultra-luxury resort, exclusive accommodations, Atlantis amenities
hotels.longDesc: The most exclusive tower at Atlantis Paradise Island, offering premium suites, private beach access, and full resort amenities for luxury-seeking families.
hotels.address: 1 Casino Drive, Paradise Island, The Bahamas

hotels.name: The Reefs
hotels.desc: Spacious family resort, kitchens, more privacy, Caribbean beachfront
hotels.longDesc: A family-oriented resort offering larger accommodations with full kitchens, providing more space and independence for families exploring Nassau.
hotels.address: 1 Casino Drive Paradise Island Grand Bahama, The Bahamas

hotels.name: The Dunmore, Harbour Island
hotels.desc: Luxury beachfront resort, pink sand beaches, intimate elegance
hotels.longDesc: An exclusive luxury resort on Harbour Island featuring iconic pink sand beaches, sophisticated accommodations, and refined Caribbean hospitality for upscale travelers.
hotels.address: Colebrook St, Dunmore Town, The Bahamas

hotels.name: Coral Sands Hotel
hotels.desc: Luxury beachfront resort, pink aesthetic, recently renovated, iconic Caribbean property
hotels.longDesc: A classically iconic luxury hotel on Harbour Island that perfectly complements its famous pink sand beach setting. Recently refined through renovation while maintaining its timeless elegance and charm.
hotels.photoAttribution: Coral Sands Inn & Cottages, Harbour Island
hotels.address: G939+F37, Chapel St, Dunmore Town, The Bahamas

hotels.name: The Farm at San SimÃ³n
hotels.desc: Celebrity-favorite island resort, tropical luxury, farm-to-table dining, beachfront paradise
hotels.longDesc: An exclusive Bahamian resort that has become a celebrity hotspot, blending luxury accommodations with farm-to-table experiences and pristine beachfront setting.
hotels.address: The dirt road, Queens Hwy, Upper Bogue, The Bahamas

hotels.name: The Surf Club at Norman's Cay Exumas
hotels.desc: New luxury resort launch, Caribbean island elegance, acclaimed brand expansion, Exuma
hotels.longDesc: The extraordinary Caribbean launch of Miami's iconic Surf Club brand, bringing acclaimed glamour and excellence to a pristine Bahamian island setting.

hotels.name: Coral Sands Resort
hotels.desc: Pink sand beach resort, iconic Bahamian hospitality, weekend getaway destination
hotels.longDesc: A legendary beachfront resort on Harbour Island renowned for its stunning pink sand beaches and classic Caribbean charm, welcoming weekend travelers seeking island relaxation.
hotels.photoAttribution: Coral Sands Inn & Cottages, Harbour Island
hotels.address: G939+F37, Chapel St, Dunmore Town, The Bahamas

hotels.name: Amancaya
hotels.desc: Ultra-luxury resort, two private cays, pristine beaches, world-class diving
hotels.longDesc: Aman's first Bahamian property across two private cays in Exuma, offering 36 pavilions and Aman Residences with signature amenities including an Aman Spa, marina, Beach Club, and exceptional dining.

hotels.name: The Ocean Club, A Four Seasons Resort
hotels.desc: Luxury beachfront resort, white sand beach, Versailles gardens, iconic movie location
hotels.longDesc: A cinematic beachfront paradise on Cabbage Beach featuring soft white sand, swaying palms, elegant poolside views, and a stunning Versailles-style garden with historic ruins.
hotels.photoAttribution: The Ocean Club, A Four Seasons Resort, Bahamas
hotels.address: Paradise Island, One Ocean Drive, Nassau, The Bahamas

hotels.name: Marina Village at Atlantis
hotels.desc: All-inclusive beachfront resort, aquariums, water parks, family pools
hotels.longDesc: Iconic mega-resort combining luxury with unlimited family activities. Kids enjoy aquariums, slides, and beach access while parents relax at world-class amenities.

restaurants.name: Macduff's
restaurants.desc: Historic fishing and yachting bar, legendary 30-year institution, local favorite
restaurants.longDesc: A storied 30-year-old bar and cottages where the fishing and yachting community gathers, offering authentic island hospitality and local character in the Exumas.

restaurants.name: Rosie's Place
restaurants.desc: Casual local eatery, authentic Bahamian cuisine, conch salad, friendly service
restaurants.longDesc: Authentic Bahamian flavors in a laid-back setting loved by locals and families. Perfect for discovering true island taste without formality or steep prices.

restaurants.name: Graycliff Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Fine dining in historic mansion, gourmet cuisine, extensive wine cellar, elegant ambiance
restaurants.longDesc: Award-winning restaurant in a restored colonial mansion offering refined international cuisine. Sophisticated dining experience for special family celebrations and memorable evenings.
restaurants.address: W Hill St, Nassau, The Bahamas

restaurants.name: CafÃ© Matisse
restaurants.desc: Upscale Italian restaurant in Nassau with courtyard dining

restaurants.name: Nobu
restaurants.desc: Japanese fusion with ocean views and kid-friendly menu
restaurants.address: One Casino Drive, Suite 13, Paradise Island, The Bahamas

restaurants.name: Twin Brothers
restaurants.desc: Family-run Bahamian soul food spot famous for cracked conch and mac and cheese

restaurants.name: Rock House Hotel and Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Waterfront dining with Caribbean-Asian fusion and stunning harbor views
restaurants.address: Bay Street, Dunmore Town, The Bahamas

restaurants.name: Sip Sip Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Charming beachside cafe with fresh seafood, colorful decor, and family-friendly vibe

restaurants.name: The Landing Hotel & Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Elegant harborfront restaurant with farm-to-table cuisine in historic setting
restaurants.address: Bay Street, Dunmore Town, The Bahamas

restaurants.name: Acquapazza Wine Bar & Ristorante
restaurants.desc: Upscale Italian restaurant in Harbour Island with waterfront views
restaurants.address: Nesbitt Street (at the former Baretta's Hotel, Dunmore Town, The Bahamas

restaurants.name: Queen Conch
restaurants.desc: Local seafood spot serving conch salad and Bahamian dishes
restaurants.address: G936+86P, Bay Street, Dunmore Town, The Bahamas

restaurants.name: Marina Pizzeria
restaurants.desc: Casual waterfront pizza spot at Atlantis Marina Village
restaurants.address: One Casino Drive, Suite 31, Paradise Island, The Bahamas

experiences.name: Pink Sands Beach
experiences.desc: Iconic naturally pink sand beach, Instagram-famous, pristine and secluded
experiences.longDesc: Harbour Island's legendary naturally pink beach, famous long before Instagram. The unique coral sand creates a stunning rose-hued shoreline that remains quietly iconic and unapologetically beautiful.

experiences.name: Cabbage Beach
experiences.desc: Pristine white sand beach, palm trees, soft sand, turquoise waters
experiences.longDesc: A stunning stretch of powdery white sand and swaying palms, home to The Ocean Club resort and a perfect Caribbean beach experience.

experiences.name: Blue Lagoon Island Bahamas
experiences.desc: Private island adventure, dolphin encounters, zip-lining, beach activities
experiences.longDesc: Thrilling day-trip destination offering dolphin swimming, ziplines, and pristine beaches. Perfect for families seeking memorable interactions with marine life.
experiences.address: One Marina Drive, Paradise Island Ferry Terminal, Nassau, The Bahamas

experiences.name: Exuma Cays Land and Sea Park Visitor Center
experiences.desc: Protected marine park, snorkeling, swimming with pigs, pristine beaches, coral reefs
experiences.longDesc: Iconic nature reserve featuring the famous swimming pigs and stunning coral gardens. Families encounter unique wildlife and crystal-clear waters in an unspoiled paradise setting.

experiences.name: Aquaventure
experiences.desc: Water park with slides, lazy river, and marine habitats at Atlantis Resort
experiences.address: One Casino Drive, Suite 42, Paradise Island, The Bahamas

experiences.name: St. Johnâ€™s Anglican Church

kidFriendly.name: Junkanoo Beach
kidFriendly.desc: Family beach, calm waters, shallow areas, beach bars, colorful atmosphere
kidFriendly.longDesc: Vibrant beach ideal for young swimmers with calm, shallow turquoise waters and nearby amenities. Named after famous Bahamian festival with energetic island vibe.

markets.name: Nassau Straw Market
markets.desc: Historic market, handmade crafts, local souvenirs, colorful woven goods
markets.longDesc: Vibrant marketplace showcasing authentic Bahamian handcrafts and souvenirs. Families browse woven baskets, artwork, and local treasures in an engaging cultural setting.
